Package com.mysql.fabric

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FabricConnection  
    FabricStateResponse<T>  
    HashShardMapping
    A shard mapping with ranges defined by hashing key values.
    RangeShardMapping
    A shard mapping that partitions data by ranges.
    Response
    Response from Fabric request.
    Server
    Database server, as represented by Fabric.
    ServerGroup
    Server Group - a set of servers responsible for the same set of data
    ShardIndex
    A shard index represents the physical location of a segment of data.
    ShardMapping
    A shard mapping representing this set of sharded data.
    ShardMappingFactory
    Factory for creating ShardMapping objects.
    ShardTable
    A shard "table" is a description of how a specific table is distributed across shards.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServerMode
    Server modes.
    ServerRole
    Server roles.
    ShardingType
    Sharding type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FabricCommunicationException
    Indicates an exceptional condition while communicating with a Fabric server.
